title: Conversation: Ed Ruscha
hero_caption: Edward Joseph Ruscha. Standard Station,1966. Harold Joachim Purchase Fund.
short_description:
Join us for this year’s annual Woman’s Board lecture and hear from acclaimed artist Ed Ruscha, as he speaks about his prolific career and practice that spans drawing, painting, photography, film, printmaking, and publishing. His talk will be followed by a conversation with deputy director and chair and curator of Modern and Contemporary Art, Ann Goldstein. 

All proceeds from the event will support the Department of Learning and Public Engagement.

Please note that tickets purchased for this program are for balcony seating at the event.
